text: This franchise had such a unique, dreamy feel to it. I can't complain at Monolithsoft's output with a 3rd Xenoblade game announced for this year, but I sure would like to play a 3rd Baten Kaitos game as well. I'm pretty sure that will never happen, but at least I know that I will enjoy their next game no matter what series it's from. They're easily one of my favorite developers with Xenosaga, BK and Xenoblade in their portfolio.
